definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The spectrometer has been equipped with an axial plasma torch and a rotary spray chamber.
sentences.chinese: 光谱仪配有端视等离子体炬和旋流雾室进样装置。

sentences.english: It's an important development to apply magnetic field to hydrocyclones.
sentences.chinese: 把磁场应用于水力旋流器是近期研究的一个重要发展。

sentences.english: The intake swirl in the cylinder was induced by a swirler which was fixed in one of two intake ports.
sentences.chinese: 采用在进气门上方安装旋流器的方法产生进气涡流。

sentences.english: A hydrocyclone device that removes large drill solids from the whole mud system.
sentences.chinese: 一种从整个泥浆系统中除去大钻屑的水力旋流装置。

sentences.english: The straight tube of spigot is an important structural parameter of hydrocyclone.
sentences.chinese: 沉砂口直管段是水力旋流器的一个重要构件。

sentences.english: The generation of swirling flow in a centrifugal tundish is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究离心中间包离心室旋流发生的方法。

sentences.english: New technique is applied to reconstruct the diversion tunnel to the vortex flow tunnel with energy dissipation.
sentences.chinese: 应用新技术将导流洞改建成旋流消能泄洪洞。

sentences.english: Gas-Liquid flow on Rotating stream tray appears a complicated picture.
sentences.chinese: 旋流塔板有复杂的气液接触状态。

sentences.english: Through the comparison of the operation principles and the characteristics of the hydrocyclone with the spiral classifier.
sentences.chinese: 通过对比水力旋流器与螺旋分级机的工作原理和特点。

sentences.english: The disc swirl spinning is a new method of spinning.
sentences.chinese: 圆盘式旋流纺纱是一种新型纺纱方法。

sentences.english: In the upper portion of the sandwich with hydrocyclone guide blade and packing filter layer.
sentences.chinese: 在内夹层的上部设有旋流导向叶片及填料过滤层。

sentences.english: The hydrocyclone is a kind of separatory and classificatory equipment.
sentences.chinese: 水力旋流器是一种应用非常广泛的分离分级设备。

sentences.english: With swirl decays the various measuring points frequency along the tunnel also corresponding weaken.
sentences.chinese: 随旋流强度的衰减沿程各测点频率也相应地衰减。

sentences.english: The split ratio had little influence on the mean droplet sizes at the wall of hydrocyclone.
sentences.chinese: 分流比对旋流器各段边壁的油滴粒径影响不大。

sentences.english: A research was conducted of the velocity field of the designed cubic-curve tube type hydrocyclones.
sentences.chinese: 对设计的三次曲线管型水力旋流器的速度场进行研究。

sentences.english: Dynamic hydrocyclone and its test bed.
sentences.chinese: 动态水力旋流器及其试验装置。

definition: water screen (screen formed of sprayed water droplets, used for displaying projected images, for temperature control, or for air purification)
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
